divs: Sighting DetailsI wanted to get more photos from different vantage points other than where I had been getting photo's for two weeks. I got in the van and travelled to the next town. All along the way I randomly snapped pictures. Upon arriving home I uploaded them to my computer and found almost one or more in every picture. I am not crazy and I can distinguish between a bird, a bug, and an airplane. In our area (really rural) we don't have many planes except for two military fighter planes that do maneuvers over our valley at varying intervals and occasionally a medivac hospital helicopter. I have caught everything from orbs, disks, rocket shaped, cloaked disks, and tube shaped ufo's over a 3 week period of time. It is strange though that after I posted on here last week and uploaded some videos and slide shows to you tube a white car (which I've never seen before ) with gov. tags that read DD or DOD-??? has driven by my house a few times. I am a father of five children and my wife and I work from home. I am pretty open minded but also analytical and logical about things. If it weren't for so many frequent incidents that seem too coinccidental I wouldn't be posting here. My wife thought I was going crazy at first until I showed her all of the sightings on file and she saw what I saw in them.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Pearisburg
There were no other sightings in Pearisburg on or around June 23rd 2007
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Snapping photos of sky from van while driving
